notifications.title: ⚡ Performance Boost
notifications.message: Mailer speed optimized by 35%. Bulk emails now send smoother with less CPU usage.

notifications.title: 📎 Smart Attachments
notifications.message: Now auto-detects unsupported file types and warns you before sending.

notifications.title: 📝 Drafts Feature
notifications.message: Save unfinished emails as drafts and continue anytime.

notifications.title: 🔐 Security Upgrade
notifications.message: Enhanced TLS/SSL support for safer email delivery.
